snippet: Aroldis Chapman, who is headed back to New York as the Yankees' closer, says Chicago manager Joe Maddon misused him in the World Series on the way to the Cubs winning the championship for the first time since 1908....
lead_paragraph: Aroldis Chapman, who is headed back to New York as the Yankees' closer, says Chicago manager Joe Maddon misused him in the World Series on the way to the Cubs winning the championship for the first time since 1908.

headline.main: Pitcher Chapman Chides World Series-Winning Manager
headline.print_headline: Pitcher Chapman Chides World Series-Winning Manager
